lyrics.stanza: Joined unto Christ the Conqueror, His Calv'ry triumph, too, Assures me in the darkest hour That He will take me through.
Joined unto Christ the risen Lord, Triumphant now above; The glory of His cross reveals Magnificence of love.
Joined unto Christ's full victory, Magnificently free; Declare it in the conquering name, And powers of darkness flee.
Joined unto Christ! Magnificent! His wondrous Calvary plan, Draws us through ages to adore; For "Worthy is the Lamb."
